events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving their vehicle and a stationary object on the morning of March 1st.
Claim was reviewed and categorized as an auto accident claim based on initial description and keywords.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will contact the customer within 24 hours.
Acknowledgment of receipt of claim sent to customer, assuring them we are processing their auto accident report.
Insurance company requested photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and a copy of the driver's license for verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos and police report to support the auto accident claim.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to determine the circumstances of the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim validity and identifying that the auto accident damages are covered under policy.
A settlement amount was proposed based on damage estimates and policy limits for the auto accident claim.
Customer provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the transparency and communication throughout the claim process.
The claim has been officially approved, authorizing payment for the repairs needed to the damaged vehicle.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover costs of vehicle repair after the auto accident claim was approved.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the completion of all necessary steps and payment.
Claim files and documents have been archived securely for future reference related to the auto accident claim.
